dashboard.headerbackbtn: BACK TO SELECT A QUESTION TYPE
dashboard.title: Multiple Choice - Standard

dateRadioGroup.openCloseDue: Use Open, Due and Close Date

modal.exitPageWarning: There are unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

itemDetail.addFirstPart: Add first part to this item
itemDetail.addNewItemToPassage: Add a new item to passage

itemGradingType.allCorrectMust: All parts need to be correct
itemGradingType.firstCorrectMust: First part has to be correct (EBSR Grading)
itemGradingType.anyCorrect: Any of the parts can be correct

pickupcomponent.backToSelect: Back to Select Question Type or Feature
pickupcomponent.question: Question

keypadSettings.warning: You are setting this keypad to all items on the test. This action will override any keypad setting that was assigned at an item-level

showRubricToStudents.info: Choose if the students should be able to view the grading rubric while attempting any question which has grading rubric associated. This setting will only be enabled if any of the question in the test has rubric attached to it.

allowAutoEssayEvaluation.title: Enable auto evaluation by AI (Essay question)
allowAutoEssayEvaluation.info: AI will assist with grading as well as feedback only if grading criteria is provided (or generated by AI ) for a given question. Otherwise, only feedback shall be provided in case this functionality is activated.

allowTeacherToRedirect.info: When allow teachers to redirect is set to ON, teachers are allowed to redirect a common test for their class. Set to OFF to prevent teachers from using the redirect test feature.

authoringItemDisabled.info: Authoring item is disabled for Dynamic Test.

showTtsForPassage.title: Allow Text To Speech For Passage
showTtsForPassage.info: When ON, students will be able to use TTS to listen to passages. When OFF, TTS will be disabled for passage-based questions.

calculatorTypesSettings.info: If students can use on-screen calculators, select the type to make available on the test.

studentAttemptTimeWindow.title: STUDENT ATTEMPT WINDOW
studentAttemptTimeWindow.toolTipMsg: Select the days and time when the students can attempt the test.

safeExamBrowser.title: Require Safe Exam Browser
safeExamBrowser.info: Ensure a secure testing environment by using Safe Exam Browser to lockdown the student's device. To use this feature, Safe Exam Browser (on Windows/Mac/iPad) must be installed on the student device. The quit password can be used by teacher or proctor to safely exit Safe Exam Browser in the middle of an assessment. The quit password should not be revealed to the students. If you select this option, students must use devices (Windows, Mac or iPad) with Safe Exam Browser installed.
safeExamBrowser.tooltip: Ensure secure testing environment by using Safe Exam Browser to lockdown the student's device. To use this feature Safe Exam Browser (on Windows/Mac only) must be installed on the student devices.

safeExamBrowserOrKioskMode.title: Require Safe Exam Browser / Kiosk Mode
safeExamBrowserOrKioskMode.info:
Ensure a secure testing environment by using Safe Exam Browser or Edulastic Kiosk Mode to lockdown the student's device. To use this feature, Safe Exam Browser (on Windows/Mac/iPad) must be installed on the student device. On Chromebook, Edulastic Kiosk app must be installed.
The quit password can be used by teacher or proctor to safely exit Safe Exam Browser in the middle of an assessment. The quit password should not be revealed to the students. The quit password cannot be used to exit Chromebook Kiosk mode.
safeExamBrowserOrKioskMode.tooltip:
Ensure a secure testing environment by using Safe Exam Browser or Edulastic Kiosk Mode to lockdown the student's device. To use this feature, Safe Exam Browser (on Windows/Mac/iPad) must be installed on the student device. On Chromebook, Edulastic Kiosk app must be installed.
The quit password can be used by teacher or proctor to safely exit Safe Exam Browser in the middle of an assessment. The quit password should not be revealed to the students. The quit password cannot be used to exit Chromebook Kiosk mode.

multiDistrictStudentPasswordError.studentEdit: Passwords can’t be edited as the student is part of multiple districts. Please ask the admin to reset the password.
multiDistrictStudentPasswordError.singleStudentPasswordReset: Password can’t be edited as the selected student(s) is/are part of multiple districts. Please ask the admin to reset the password.
multiDistrictStudentPasswordError.multiStudentPasswordReset: Reset password is not allowed for student(s) belonging to multiple districts. Please ask the admin to reset the password for:

immersiveReader.description: Enable immersive reader to get full screen reading, increased readability with options like focus mode, font spacing, parts of speech identification, syllabification & translation

skipAlert.description: When enabled, a student can not skip a question without confirmation.

scratchPad.description: When enabled, a student can open ScratchPad to show their work. The tool contains options for text, drawing, shapes, rulers, and more.

magnifier.description: This tool provides visual assistance. When enabled, students can move the magnifier around the page to enlarge areas of their screen.

rubric.stimulusNotPresent: Rubric cannot be auto generated without question.
rubric.rubricAlreadyGenerated: Rubrics is already generated for the provided question.
